files.template:
import * as Slider from '@radix-ui/react-slider';
export default function S(){ return (<Slider.Root defaultValue={[50]} max={100} step={1} className='w-64 h-5'><Slider.Track className='bg-gray-200 h-1 rounded'><Slider.Range className='bg-black h-1 rounded'/></Slider.Track><Slider.Thumb className='block w-3 h-3 bg-black rounded-full'/></Slider.Root>); }
